Uses of Package
com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.protectpdf

  • Packages that use com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.protectpdf 
    Package Description
    com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops
    Contains the classes for operations that generate or transform PDF files.
    com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.protectpdf
    Contains the option classes for ProtectPDFOperation.
  • Classes in com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.protectpdf used by com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops 
    Class and Description
    ProtectPDFOptions
    Marker base class for ProtectPDFOperation options.
  • Classes in com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.protectpdf used by com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.protectpdf 
    Class and Description
    ContentEncryption
    Supported types of content to encrypt for ProtectPDFOperation
    EncryptionAlgorithm
    Supported encryption algorithms for ProtectPDFOperation
    PasswordProtectOptions
    Parameters for securing PDF file with passwords and document permissions using ProtectPDFOperation.
    PasswordProtectOptions.Builder
    Builds a PasswordProtectOptions instance.
    Permission
    Supported document permission types for ProtectPDFOperation
    Permissions
    Document Permissions for ProtectPDFOperation
    ProtectPDFOptions
    Marker base class for ProtectPDFOperation options.
